about_the_game:
Crumbling is a VR rogue-like action adventure.
★ Action-Figure-like controls. Only possible in VR!
★ Challenging rogue-like fights. Looks easy, but isn't!
★ Romping story with animated comics & narrator!
★ Detail-rich toy diorama worlds
★ Mini Games, collectibles, and much more to discover!

Talk to the devs on
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Action-Figure VR

In Crumbling, you control your character directly with your motion controller, as if it was an action figure in your hand. Unwrap your hero from its blister pack, wave it around and smash monsters with powerful attacks!

But observe your foes closely! Only if you anticipate their every move can you avoid their assault. Evade and counter at just the right moment to keep the upper hand in action-packed hack'n'slash combat.

Comics

Discover the story of Crumbling through animated and narrated comic books. Learn how the evil Böse Corp. stole all the magic from Mr. and Mrs Crumble in order to make their horrible monster toys come alive. Can you stop them and reclaim the magic? The fate of the Crumble's famous store is in your hands - quite literally!

Unlock Content

Reclaim the stolen magic and use it to revive all kinds of toys: New Crumblings, more theme worlds, comic pages, and collectible power ups! Discover the lovingly created toy worlds of Mr. and Mrs Crumble and enjoy all the details. Between the glass covers and the cardboard backdrops you set the stage and put the monsters of Böse Corp. in their place!

name: Crumbling

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 or newer
  • Processor: Intel i5-4590 equivalent or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 970, AMD Radeon R9 280 equivalent or better
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • VR Support: OpenXR
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i7-3770 equivalent or better
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1060, AMD Radeon RX 580 equivalent or better
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • VR Support: OpenXR

short_description: Woosh! Bam! Pow! Remember playing with action figures? Put on your VR headset, grab your favorite Crumbling and fight your way through an onslaught of plastic monsters in this unique third-person action rogue-like that brings you right back to your childhood!
supported_languages:
English*, French*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Japanese*, Korean*, Portuguese - Portugal
*languages with full audio support
